00035 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00036 unsigned AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetNumElementAttributes() const
00037 {
00038     // By default returns 0.  If a concrete class does read attributes
00039     // it needs to overload this method.
00040     return 0;
00041 }
00042 
00043 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00044 unsigned AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetNumFaceAttributes() const
00045 {
00046     // By default returns 0.  If a concrete class does read attributes
00047     // it needs to overload this method.
00048     return 0;
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00052 ElementData AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetNextEdgeData()
00053 {
00054     return GetNextFaceData();
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00059 std::vector<double> AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetNode(unsigned index)
00060 {
00061     EXCEPTION("Random access is only implemented in mesh readers for binary mesh files.");
00062 }
00063 
00064 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00065 ElementData AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetElementData(unsigned index)
00066 {
00067     EXCEPTION("Random access is only implemented in mesh readers for binary mesh files.");
00068 }
00069 
00070 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00071 ElementData AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetFaceData(unsigned index)
00072 {
00073     EXCEPTION("Random access is only implemented in mesh readers for binary mesh files.");
00074 }
00075 
00076 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00077 ElementData AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetEdgeData(unsigned index)
00078 {
00079     return GetFaceData(index);
00080 }
00081 
00082 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00083 std::string AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::GetMeshFileBaseName()
00084 {
00085     return "";
00086 }

00088 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00089 bool AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>::IsFileFormatBinary()
00090 {
00091     return false;
00092 }
